featured.text: Legend tells us he finally called the guitar a miniature orchestra.
Indeed the guitar does sound like a little orchestra!

definition.zh_def: 管弦樂團，一組演奏各種樂器的音樂家，通常包括弦樂器、木管樂器、銅管樂器和打擊樂器。
definition.en_def: A large group of musicians who play together on various instruments, typically including strings, woodwinds, brass, and percussion.
definition.example: The orchestra performed a beautiful symphony at the concert hall.
